info.author: Avinash Kak
info.description:
**Version 2.0** is a Python 3.x compliant version of the
Bit2DArray class.  This version should work with both Python
2.x and Python 3.x.

This module utilizes the facilities of the **BitVector**
class (Version 3.0 or above) to create a memory efficient
representation for 2D bit arrays.

The class supports the following operators/methods:

-    __str__
-    __getitem__
-    __setitem__
-    __getslice__
-    __eq__
-    __ne__
-    __and__
-    __or__
-    __xor__
-    __invert__
-    deep_copy
-    size
-    read_bit_array_from_char_file
-    read_bit_array_from_binary_file
-    write_bit_array_to_char_file
-    write_bit_array_to_packed_binary_file
-    shift
-    dilate
-    erode
info.name: Bit2DArray
info.summary: A memory-efficient packed representation for 2D bit arrays
info.html_description:
Version 2.0 is a Python 3.x compliant version of the Bit2DArray class. This version should work with both Python 2.x and Python 3.x.

This module utilizes the facilities of the BitVector class (Version 3.0 or above) to create a memory efficient representation for 2D bit arrays.

The class supports the following operators/methods:

  • __str__
  • __getitem__
  • __setitem__
  • __getslice__
  • __eq__
  • __ne__
  • __and__
  • __or__
  • __xor__
  • __invert__
  • deep_copy
  • size
  • read_bit_array_from_char_file
  • read_bit_array_from_binary_file
  • write_bit_array_to_char_file
  • write_bit_array_to_packed_binary_file
  • shift
  • dilate
  • erode
